idiom_translate: I can’t just stand by and watch a child face those dangerous men.
label: I can’t just sit  back and watch a young girl like you deal with such dangerous  men.
idiom:
호락호락하지 않아요 : They won't go down without a fight
마물의 밥 : Easy prey for monsters
은혜를 모르는 놈들 : Ungrateful wretches
대화는 말이 통해야 하는 거지? : Conversation only works if both sides listen
